response_text: [{"id":12889922,"title":"Joe Budden @ Howard Theatre in Washington, DC","datetime":"2016-12-23T20:00:00","formatted_datetime":"Friday, December 23, 2016 at 8:00PM","formatted_location":"Washington, DC","ticket_url":"http://www.bandsintown.com/event/12889922/buy_tickets?app_id=ticketgame\u0026artist=Joe+Budden\u0026came_from=67","ticket_type":"Tickets","ticket_status":"available","on_sale_datetime":"2016-09-09T16:00:00","facebook_rsvp_url":"http://www.bandsintown.com/event/12889922?app_id=ticketgame\u0026artist=Joe+Budden\u0026came_from=67","description":"Vocalists Prentiss McNeil (The Drifters) and Bruce \"Big Daddy\" Wayne (Wilson Pickett's Midnight Movers) bring some serious soul power to this fully-staged revue featuring the best R\u0026B music of the classic era from the mid-'60s to the early '70s. Get ready to groove to hits from James Brown, Smokey Robinson, Stevie Wonder and Aretha Franklin, not to mention Motown and Stax artists galore.
